items.title: The Procter & Gamble Company (PG) One of 24 Original Dividend Aristocrats Still in the Index
items.description: The Procter & Gamble Company (NYSE:PG) is included among the 11 Best Dividend Aristocrat Stocks to Invest in Now. The initial version of the S&P Dividend Aristocrats list was introduced in January 2003, highlighting the S&P companies that had maintained consistent dividend payments for 25 consecutive years. The list gained attention, especially after Microsoft declared […]

items.title: Wedbush Raises Microsoft Corporation (MSFT)’s Price Target to $600 on Azure, Copilot Potential
items.description: Microsoft Corporation (NASDAQ:MSFT) is among the 13 Best Big Name Stocks to Buy Now. On June 25, Wedbush hiked its price target for the stock to $600 from $515, while maintaining an Outperform rating for its shares. The analysts cited a ‘massive adoption wave’ for Copilot and Azure as the reason behind the revision. They estimate […]

items.title: Microsoft Corporation (MSFT)’s Next-Gen AI Chip Production Delayed To Next Year: Report
items.description: Microsoft Corporation (NASDAQ:MSFT) is among the Goldman Sachs Stock Portfolio: 10 Large-Cap Stocks To Buy. On Friday, American business publication The Information reported that production of the company’s next-generation AI chip is being delayed to 2026. The media group, citing three sources familiar with the matter, said that the Maia AI chip was facing a delay […]
